metadata.title: CVE-2020-14402 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in LibVNCServer before 0.9.13. libvncserver/corre.callows out-of-bounds access via encodings.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-14402` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libvncclient1 - 0.9.13+dfsg-1
libvncserver1 - 0.9.13+dfsg-1
No subscription required

vino - 3.22.0-6ubuntu2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libvncserver package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.9.13+dfsg-1').
vino package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.22.0-6ubuntu2').
x11vnc package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
veyon package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
